graph_title: Population 25-64 years of age enrolled in non-formal, adult education by age groups and sex
indicator_name: Population 25-64 years of age enrolled in non-formal, adult education by age groups and sex
title: Untitled
national_indicator_description: Non-formal education is an organized process of learning and education aimed at training adults for work, for various social activities, for personal development and supplementing knowledge, skills and abilities according to special programs carried out by education organizers (schools, training centers, business entities, agencies and similar) and which takes place independently of the official (formal) education system and does not lead to the acquisition of public documents (diplomas and qualifications).
